title: custom constructed queries
extract: Custom Function in simple definition is a query that run by other queries. The main benefit of having a query to run by other queries is that you can repeat a number of steps on the same data structure.Dec 6, 2016
extract_html: Custom Function in simple definition is a query that run by other queries. The main benefit of having a query to run by other queries is that you can repeat a number of steps on the same data structure.Dec 6, 2016
